reviews.review: Not fun to play as a killer anymore
Jogo chave pra jogar com a rapaziada <3

Cheat by Daylight
As a top level MMR killer main I don't recommend this game at current state!
So after playing dozens of hours on the other platform I moved on to Steam right before developers announced a new SBMM system expecting to have some fun, but this turned out into a horrible cheaters epidemic.
Since this game doesn't have VAC protection and their EAC literally does nothing when you get to the top level literally every second match there's at least one cheater up to all 4 in a lobby!!!

Basically there are 3 types of cheaters:
1. These players will immediately show off their cheats like instantly flying into you, do insta fast gens, insta heals etc.
2. The subtle ones, they will play "fair" as long as they like how you play or as long as they don't lose. If you down them and there's no one around to help, they gonna pull out heavy artillery hacks like the first type.
3. Now these players are also subtle and they will use some soft cheats like wallhacks, faster gen repair speed and sometimes some slightly faster movement. Normally you won't even notice that if you have little amount of hours in game or if they don't mess up.

What can you do while you have these people in your match?
Nothing, you just accept the loss and pray they won't keep you hostage ingame, yes you read that right, you can be forced to stay ingame forever unless you disconnect from the match and here comes the best part! You get an auto ban for leaving the match, the first penalty is 5 minutes, but with each DC it can grow up to 24H, because why would you need a "Give Up" button, right!?

What can you do after the match ends?
Long story short - again literally nothing!
But hey, developers implemented a sort of report system ingame which does nothing, you can click here and there but no one gonna bother reading these reports anyway.
So they have the second option, you wanna cheaters get bans? Fine, go to our site, make a ticket, get a video footage (right, you have to put on the record every game LOL) with a cheater, get their Steam ID's and bla bla bla and maybe just maybe someone will bother to read your ticket after a month  (remember, while cheater keeps cheating).
Or you will just receive a typical email:
"We are currently dealing with a high volume of tickets, so it may take a little longer to get back to you."

But oh wow, cheater does get banned!? You got lucky!
No problem, they will just buy another account for 20$ or even less from some shady site and the loop continues.
And the best part of this on 2 of December 2021 the game went to EGS and for a limited period of time anyone can grab a free copy to their library. What does that mean? Well, cheaters just can stock up an infinite amount of copies for their liking!

If you want to play something like that, well I warned you, it's your own funeral ;)

Но в целом игра достойна внимания, даже спустя 5 лет после выхода её не прекращают одаривать плюшками и DLC (разной степени успешности).

The devs are killing this game. After 1k hours, to which I'd say the first 2/3 were actually fun, the devs are so hellbent on putting this game in the ground that I'm just officially done with it. There are literally better games out and coming out like Propnight, the upcoming VHS and much later on the DBZ DBD clone. Don't waste your time. This game will eat all of your time and you'll only enjoy 25% of it.

It's also now impossible to play this game for fun in any way whatsoever, like playing meme builds as killer or blatant jokes like "24/7 tentacle nemesis" because MMR has shifted the mentality to this game of "must sweat and win every game ever", so when you play something that's blatantly a joke or for fun, survivors will still just loop as sweaty as they can and bang out every gen and go next. There is absolutely no valid reason to play this horseshit game anymore aside from custom games with your friends, where fun can actually be had.
